description: A request to the NATS $SYS monitoring endpoint for connection information
title: io.nats.server.monitor.v1.connz_request

sort.description: Sort the results. Only the sort by connection ID (cid) is ascending, all others are descending

auth.description: Include user names in the results

subscriptions_detail.description: Include subscription details in the results

offset.description: Pagination offset. Only return connections starting at this offset from the global results

limit.description: Maximum number of connections to return

cid.description: Filter for this explicit client connection ID

mqtt_client.description: Filter for this explicit MQTT client ID
